text: KFSW (1650 AM / 98.7 FM, "The Cross 98.7") is a radio station broadcasting a southern gospel format to the Fort Smith, Arkansas, United States, area. The station is licensed to G2 Media Group LLC. KFSW's AM signal has one of the largest areas of coverage for AM stations in Fort Smith, while the FM signal at K254AM-FM 98.7 broadcasts in a radius from Fort Smith reaching as far away as Spiro and Muldrow in Oklahoma as well as Greenwood and Van Buren in Arkansas. ==Station Changes== On September 17, 2012, the FCC was notified that KFSW was sold to G2 Media Group LLC.KYHN FCC Station Status database On October 2, 2015, the station changed its call letters from KYHN to KFSW.CDBS Call Sign History KFSW The station added K254AM-FM 98.7 as a repeater in November 2015. On January 1, 2020 KFSW changed their format from contemporary Christian to southern gospel, branded as "The Cross 98.7".KFSW Flips to Southern Gospel Radioinsight - January 5, 2020 ==Previous logo== 200px ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Contemporary Christian radio stations in the United States FSW Category:Radio stations established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in Arkansas FSW
title: KFSW
